title: Need ID on type in Genrooq Magazine
content:
Need ID on type in Genrooq Magazine

Audi R8 GT please, thank you!

comments.content: Could be as easy as [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824200845/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica) Condensed Black.
